::: MEGATRON spins around to Quikstrike. His small sphereical body floats in 
front of the fuzors face ::: You will tell me the codes! Once I have the 
codes we can take control of the ship, and squash that damn spider!

::: Nervously he jets over to Shredder ::: If you dont hand over the codes, I 
will order Shredder to....cause you pain like you have never experienced 
before!

~~~~~~~~~~~~~

::: HELL BEAST reads the message. After a few hours they had finally broken 
the code :::

::: BLACK ARACNIA ::: So, Ol' bug face has hired the Oblitercons to escourt 
Quickstrike here....and Megatron is still alive.

::: HELL BEAST ::: Yes....this is quite disturbing indeed. We will begin to 
fortify the base at once. Call Mosquitor, Inferno, Rampage, and Tankkor. This 
base will not fall into enemy hands.

::: PHENIOX looked to him ::: And what of Transanulas?

::: HELL BEAST ::: We will hold him hostage. If Megatrons group and the 
Oblitercons want to fight, we will fight. But it will cost them the spiders 
life!

::: He stomps away :::

~~~~~~~~~~~

::: TRANSANULAS paced his lab that now served as his cell. He couldnt get out 
and all communications were cut off. There was nothing he could do. :::

::: TRANSANULAS ::: Blast! I need those codes.

::: He knew it was only a matter of time before HELL BEAST opened that door 
and killed him. Even if he did get out, Gremlin and Jackle were guarding him 
according to the security cameras. Jackle was small, smaller than Rat Trap, 
he wasnt really a threat. But Gremlin was the same size as Inferno, and just 
as powerful. Both were toted plasma assult riffles so he wouldnt get very 
far...:::

::: TRANSANULAS looks to the Proto-form. It was large, and what ever he 
animal he picked it would be powerful. ...Should he use it? If it came down 
to the line, he would use it definetly. Sacrifice it if nessecery. He just 
hoped Megatron and the Oblitercons came. With them as a distraction he could 
escape. :::
